markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5104) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 222 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Witch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=217)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5100); master in the skill associated with your patron's tradition

</column>

---

You gain the expert [spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2132).

<title level="2">Expert Witch Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5105)
name: Expert Witch Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Witch Spellcasting; master in the skill associated with your patron's tradition
